item.title: Release Notes
item.description:
Issues

For issues, see the GitHub issues page.

ahrs0.2

Feb 22, 2017

The second beta release, ahrs0.2, is available on the https://github.com/westphae/stratux releases page. This release uses the “SimpleAHRS” algorithm. In essence, it calculates the turn rate based on GPS, then applies corrections using the MPU-9250 gyro sensors. This allows it to respond to attitude changes much more quickly than GPS alone can, and also to indicate uncoordinated maneuvers. The algorithm doesn’t use a Kalman filter.

Changes: 1. Fixed an issue where if the Sensors switch were on and no BMP280 were attached, gen_gdl90 would panic. 2. Fixed a panic in network.go due to concurrent reading/writing of a map.
